snippet: The choreographer, who is a fan favorite on “So You Think You Can Dance,” is bringing her combative style to New York theater and concert dance.
abstract: Choreographer Sonya Tayeh, best known as guest judge on reality television show So You Think You Can Dance, is bringing her combative style to New York theater and concert dance worlds; her moves can be seen in Encores! coming production of Andrew Lippa musical The Wild Party.
lead_paragraph: The choreographer, who is a fan favorite on “So You Think You Can Dance,” is bringing her combative style to New York theater and concert dance.

headline.main: Sonya Tayeh Strides Into New York’s Dance World With ‘The Wild Party’
headline.print_headline: Seeking a Fit, With Wild Abandon
